items.title: Finding Humanity in the Cracks of Justice
items.description: News Inside Issue 21 presents stories of connection, resistance and hope amid deteriorating conditions and discriminatory policies.

items.title: Getting a Single Parking Ticket in Lorain Led Hundreds to Lose Their Driver’s Licenses
items.description: A Marshall Project - Cleveland investigation has prompted city officials to stop issuing parking citations that, for years, led to license suspensions...

items.title: How to Support Our Journalism — and Have Your Donation Matched
items.description: Donations from readers are essential to fueling our journalism. If you value our work, please join us today.

items.title: How ICE Is Making It Harder for Immigrants to Escape Domestic Violence
items.description: Increased enforcement and Trump’s policy changes are causing some people to remain in abusive relationships rather than risk deportation, experts say.

items.title: Homeless Camp Sweeps Can Harm Health. Some Cities Are Trying a New Way.
items.description: Some localities are addressing street homelessness with a new approach, which experts say can clear encampments while protecting the health of people ...
